entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Actually use InExpression with subquery #30955
  • Compiled Models: Entity Type Namespaces #30945
  • The binary operator Equal is not defined for the types 'System.Nullable`1[System.DateTime]' and 'System.DateTime' #30944
  • EF 7 not loading my entities when using Eager or Explicit loading (Blazor Server)... #30943

Closed

  • How can i disable the new "OPENJSON" feature when using primitive collections? #30946
  • Context.ChangeTracker in EFCore 7 is "losing" added entities #30787
  • How to compare, migrate, and update tables and entities using EF methods #30941

PullRequests

Created

  • Normalize Any to Contains instead of vice versa #30956
  • Update SDK #30954
    area-infrastructure
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.core from 2.1.4 to 2.1.5 #30953
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_e_sqlcipher from 2.1.4 to 2.1.5 #30952
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_e_sqlite3 from 2.1.4 to 2.1.5 #30951
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.OData from 8.1.2 to 8.2.0 #30950
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_winsqlite3 from 2.1.4 to 2.1.5 #30949
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • Allow value comparers for supertypes of the mapping's type #30939
    auto-merge

Updated

  • Add analyzer/codefix for usage of interpolated strings in raw query methods #30835
